LanguageData.Apparel_ContractorBodyArmor.label: Contractor Power Armour
LanguageData.Apparel_ContractorBodyArmor.description: A set of Contractor Power Armour, usually seen used to by mercenaries and rogues out on Rimworlds. its advance to servos and motors allows for extra mobility to the wearer. Comes with toxic resistance lining and temperature regulation systems for extreme environment use. Incredibly resistant to heat.
LanguageData.Apparel_ContractorArmorHelmet.label: Contractor Helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_ContractorArmorHelmet.descriptio: A standard Contractor Helmet. it is usually seen used to by mercenaries and rogues out on Rimworlds. it is more advanced than the marine helmet. Comes with an integrated breathing filter and temperature regulation systems for extreme environment use. Incredibly resistant to heat.
LanguageData.Melee_ContractorsCombatKnife.label: Contractors Combat Knife
LanguageData.Melee_ContractorsCombatKnife.description: A standard issue contractors combat knife, has a inbuilt plasma blade
LanguageData.Gun_LNF35L.label: LNF35L Shadow
LanguageData.Gun_LNF35L.description: The LNF35L "Shadow" is a pretty standard charge rifle, nothing much to say about it. Has a relatively low rate of fire
LanguageData.Gun_LNF35L.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_LNF35L.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_LNF35L.label: LNF35L "Shadow" bullet
LanguageData.Gun_B3500A.label: B350A Tech
LanguageData.Gun_B3500A.description: The B3500A "Tech" is a powerful charge shotgun nicknamed the Tech because its favoured by mercenary technicians at the front line
LanguageData.Gun_B3500A.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_B3500A.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_B3500A.label: B3500A "Tech" pallets
LanguageData.Gun_L45E.label: L45E Ghost
LanguageData.Gun_L45E.description: The L45E "Ghost" is a charge pistol, like most pistols its short range and low accuracy make it less than useful for long range combat it can however make a decent backup weapon or a good primary weapon for an overzealous mercenary
LanguageData.Gun_L45E.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_L45E.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_L45E.label: L45E "Ghost" bullet
LanguageData.Gun_M34A.label: M34A Stalker
LanguageData.Gun_M34A.description: The M34A "Stalker" is a charge a sniper rifle that fires a high powered charge bolt *CAUTION: overcharging may cause irreparable damage and death
LanguageData.Gun_M34A.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_M34A.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_M34A.label: M34A "Stalker" bullet
LanguageData.Gun_M168B.label: M168B "Spectre"
LanguageData.Gun_M168B.description: The M168B "Spectre" is a charge battle rifle firing high powered charge rounds, it's high rate of fire makes it somewhat less accurate then other charge rifles of its type however it packs quite a punch
LanguageData.Gun_M168B.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_M168B.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_M168B.label: M168B "Spectre" bullet
LanguageData.Gun_M340V.label: M340V Wraith
LanguageData.Gun_M340V.description: The M340V "Wraith" is a charge GPMG based off of the ancient M240B, preferred for medium to long range engagement and higher accuracy than the comparatively unwieldy LMGs found on the rim
LanguageData.Gun_M340V.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_M340V.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_M340V.label: M340V "Wraith" bullet
LanguageData.Gun_MS700G.label: MS700G Trace
LanguageData.Gun_MS700G.description: The MS700G "Trace" is a charge SMG based off of the ancient MP7, often favoured for its incredibly effective close range performance and high rate of fire
LanguageData.Gun_MS700G.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_MS700G.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_MS700G.label: MS700G "Trace" bullet
LanguageData.Gun_RHSC120P.label: RHSC120P "Hawk"
LanguageData.Gun_RHSC120P.description: The RHSC120P "Hawk" is a revoloving charge pistol often used by offcers
LanguageData.Gun_RHSC120P.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_RHSC120P.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_RHSC120P.label: RHSC120P "Hawk" bullet
LanguageData.Gun_SLZ556S.label: SLZ556 Bull
LanguageData.Gun_SLZ556S.description: The SLZ556 "Bull" is a charged assault rifle often used by offcers, manufactured by Luizi Extrasolar Arms. Has a middling rate of fire.
LanguageData.Gun_SLZ556S.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_SLZ556S.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_SLZ556S.label: SLZ556 "Bull" bullet
LanguageData.Gun_SCR.label: SCR Survival Rifle
LanguageData.Gun_SCR.description: The SCR Particle Rifle is a self charging rifle design for survival situations requiring no ammunition to function, however this is at the cost of its stopping power, manufactured by Luizi Extrasolar Arms
LanguageData.Gun_SCR.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_SCR.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_SCR.label: SCR bullet
LanguageData.Gun_AUGS.label: AUGS "Dreamer"
LanguageData.Gun_AUGS.description: The AUGS "Dreamer" is a standard charge rifle, it's complex receiver allows for performance equivalent to an extra 8.5 inches of barrel. Has the highest rate of fire out of all standard Contractor rifles
LanguageData.Gun_AUGS.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_AUGS.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_AUGS.label: AUGS "Dreamer" bullet
LanguageData.Gun_HKCAS42A.label: HKCAS42A "Phoenix"
LanguageData.Gun_HKCAS42A.description: The HKCAS42A "Phoenix" is a powerful charge chain shotgun generally favoured by mercenary commanders when paired with the MS700G
LanguageData.Gun_HKCAS42A.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_HKCAS42A.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_HKCAS42A.label: HKCAS42A "Phoenix" bullet
LanguageData.Gun_AT45A.label: AT45A "Disintegrator"
LanguageData.Gun_AT45A.description: The AT45A "Disintegrator" is a a man portable shoulder mounted anti-vehicle charge launcher based off of the ancient AT4, usually repurposed to fight mechanoids
LanguageData.Gun_AT45A.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_ContractorATRocket.label: AT45A "Disintegrator" Rocket
LanguageData.Gun_FAL450A.label: FAL450A "Divider"
LanguageData.Gun_FAL450A.description: The FAL450A "Divider" is a Marksman's heavy rifle that comes with multiple accessories including forward grip and bipod for increased accuracy
LanguageData.Gun_FAL450A.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_FAL450A.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_FAL450A.label: FAL450A "Divider" bullet
LanguageData.Gun_M870C.label: M870C "Disruptor"
LanguageData.Gun_M870C.description: The M870C "Disruptor" is a hand-held single shot Grenade Launcher best used against groups
LanguageData.Gun_M870C.tools.0.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_ContractorGrenadeRocket.label: M870C "Disruptor" Grenade
LanguageData.Gun_ML237S.label: ML237S "Devastator"
LanguageData.Gun_ML237S.description: The ML237S "Devastator" is a heavy anti material rifle, typically repurposed as a sniper rifle. Extremely effective against armour.
LanguageData.Gun_ML237S.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_ML237S.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_ML237S.label: ML237S "Devastator" bullet
